name: Germ Adventure
description:
UA game jam 2020
Theme : YOu are the Bad gUYs

UA GameJam 2020 Germ Adventure

  • Controller : use AWSD to move , space to reset level when dead, Esc to exit game, press P to back to main menu
  • How to play:
    • avoid facing the lysol sprays or you deaddd
    • hide behind objects
    • find the fruits to spread the germ
    • only 2 levels

Download to play is better than play on web due to LAG
